reviewText:
I CAN'T BELIEVE THAT AMAZON SAID THIS WAS THIS  A NEW DVD.  IT IS A BOOTLEG COPY FROM AN OLD FILM.  THE WHOLE FILM IS SHORTS FROM A "1960" PEEP SHOW.  SOME WERE IMPOSSIBLE TO WATCH.  I COULDN'T EVEN SEE WHAT WAS GOING ON IN THE FILM. I HAD BOUGHT TWO DISCS  ONE DOESN'T WORK AT ALL IN ANY OF MY PLAYERS.

THIS DISC IS A TOTAL WASTE OF MONEY AND ANYTHING BUT NEW.  YOU MIGHT AS WELL THROW YOUR MONEY IN THE STREET .  STAY AWAY FROM ANY OF THESE TITLES

This dvd fails to inform you that their is NO sound other than old time piano and the footage is grainy at it's best. If your looking for a fetish vid your better off buying ANYTHING other than this series. I watched it immedialty after recieving it and then threw it directly into the trash. I'm not kidding, I basically took money out of my wallet and tossed it into the garbage.

This film is a classic and deserves some recognition in the vintage genre.  It features loops of hot young vintage babes forced into submission, toyed with, bound by all limbs, and in so many possible ways. Truly, truly, entertaining and a real collector's item.
